pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation Methods for Stochastic Differential Mixed Effects Models // Inference on stochastic differential models Ornstein- Uhlenbeck or Cox-Ingersoll-Ross, with one or two random effects in the drift function. S. Hermann, K. Ickstadt and C. Mueller (2016) doi:10.1002/asmb.2175 M. Delattre, V. Genon-Catalot and A. Samson (2012) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9469.2012.00813.x F. Comte, V. Genon-Catalot and A. Samson (2013) doi:10.1016/j.spa.2013.04.009 V. Genon-Catalot and C. Laredo (2014) doi:10.1080/02331888.2016.1141910 C. Dion and V. Genon- Catalot (2015) doi:10.1007/s11203-015-9122-0.
